item.title: Merry Christmas: 2025 Was A Record-Breaking Year For Greed
item.description: Greed will keep you in its thoughts and prayers in the new year.

item.title: Meme Stocks And The $10,000 Hourly Rate
item.description: Much like what happened with GameStop, could there be a perfect storm brewing to drive top rates upward to the unheard-of $10,000 rate?

item.title: The Day That ChatGPT Died: Lessons For The Rest Of Us
item.description: We need to think before we become overly reliant on any technology but particularly GenAI.

item.title: Once A Real Estate Developer …
item.description: Offering economic solutions to problems that do not have economic roots goes nowhere.

item.title: We Gathered 50 Healthcare Financial Leaders. Here’s What We Learned
item.description: The leaders who will thrive are those who can see both sides of every equation: mission and margin, empathy and efficiency, innovation and trust.
